ðŸ“– Summary: Duplicati is a free, open-source backup client written in C# that securely stores encrypted, incremental, and compressed backups on cloud storage services and remote file servers. It supports various destinations like Amazon S3, Google Drive, and WebDAV, and offers features like AES-256 encryption, a built-in scheduler, and flexible backup options.
